Reviews.Title: “Ars-mazing”
Reviews.Author: EmilyandDan09
Reviews.Content: understand bad reviews hotel read visited stayed ars hotel little worried concerned neednt moment arrived staff extremely helpful advice rome visit monuments recommend eat time rome trip birthday boyfriend boyfriend requests via email jacuzzi bath treat arranged arrival breakfast traditional european breakfast bread toast jam cereal yoghurt ham cheese eggs delicious cake severed breakfast whilst europe teas juices coffees hotel little central rome easy city especially staff helpful provided maps help city detail route bus enjoyed little city experienced lived traditional deli close hotel main road icecream parlour selling pastries cakes drinks icecream pastries cheaper city decided write review reading bad reviews regarding hotel lovely hotel friendly approachable staff definitely stay visit rome

Reviews.Title: “Appauling welcome, but otherwise OK hotel”
Reviews.Author: MarkHaff
Reviews.Content: visited rome 3 day break hotel advertised fairly cheap easy reach city centre bus takes 30 minutes ok hindsight stay closer notable stay welcome requested via hotel taxi meet airport arrival sign driver managed packed taxi hotels taxi theyd sent wrong airport cost lot money arrival hotel received barrage abuse staff twice staying unfortunately little stay otherwise ok location hotel isnt bit dingy street rome lay night decent breakfast fits bill

Reviews.Title: “Four Stars worth one”
Reviews.Author: AGADOTTI
Reviews.Content: arrived hotel checked liked discovered staff moved worse desk complaining staff sent wandering search desk finally found day arrived late night bed blanket douvet called sent single blanket cover bed called claimed run douvet night finally insisting phone douvet arrived bed ourselves incredible service 1 star hotel facilities rated top 3 star 4 stars

Reviews.Title: “ARS staff comes honestly by it's name”
Reviews.Author: msr63
Reviews.Content: havent checked am writing leave facility reasonable customer service atrocious internet didnt day checked wireless internet allegedly available told american computers offer solution resolve reach friends family customer service throughout stay deplorable worse stay lasted topper fined alleged wine stain bedding told drink carried wine glasses managers purchased wine hotel bar bad wine fine equaled nights stay ironic hotel bedding easily laundered resonable rate plenty nice stay rome

Reviews.Title: “Very far from a 4 star level. If you get a really good deal, go for it, it's a decent accomodation.”
Reviews.Author: SCrCologne
Reviews.Content: pretty city center bus connection half hour plus waiting time buses crowded pretty uncomfortable luggage inefficient design desk water kettle plugged power outlet fridge shelf shower soap bottles dirty worn shades worst windows pretty dismal view block light transparent white shades expected sleep design hotel makes cumbersome move expecially arrive luggage flights stairs adjacent building breakfast bad little offer staff little wait plates washed recommend unless tight budget offer guess acceptable considering 4 star pretty joke

Reviews.Title: “But the night!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: masterjoy
Reviews.Content: stayed week impression hotel located peaceful connected center rome clean environment particular design comfortable night night concierge unhelpful didnt speak english staff smiling

Reviews.Title: “Just awful! Staff attitude shocking. No management. Dont go.”
Reviews.Author: PDM44
Reviews.Content: brief rant mixture inept staff staff nice female management evidence 5 star joke top 30 min bus ride centre hated dirty blinds broken plastic cups coffee water coke minbar staff kettle laughed contact management identification purposes 6 november balconies condition booking blatant misrepresentation advertising tv tuned blurred door iffy property indicating dogs guns inside street else please ticked incredible staff

Reviews.Title: “Not bad”
Reviews.Author: bulkam
Reviews.Content: stay ars hotel week 5 nights fairly satisfied staff friendly helpful breakfast lady moody helpful breakfast acceptable repetitive continental breakfast scrambled egg bacon fresh pastry rolls sliced meat cheese cereals cakes fruit hotel clean modern situated quiet location easily accessible city centre public transport 20 minutes termini station downside clean modern size disappointing bathroom tiny shower cubical hardly didn’t spend time sleep spending day city served purpose planning spent day rome hesitate book hotel planning hang wouldn’t recommend

Reviews.Title: “Worth the money - and the travel”
Reviews.Author: Graham_In_Brisvegas
Reviews.Content: wife adult son stayed ars nights september 2010 satisfied comfortable clean free broadband adequate breakfast included tarriff thats perfect id recommend friends pros friendly staff 24 hour concierge broadband wifi cable pc lobby reasonable breakfast coffee quiet location cons 25 minute busride termini enjoyed daily ride food breakfast beter eat local trattorias anyway overall id 35 5 probably stay time rome

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Martaandsilvia
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights overall happy hotel yes middle city centre actually liked location quiet crowed streets traffic plus distance reflected price express bus stops steps takes termini station 15 minutes bit rush hours 30 min bus frequent reliable hotel clean staff polite helpful liked deco modern light furniture quality bedding computers lounge guests helpful printing cards googling info etc breakfast plentiful plenty dining fighting table hotel restaurant caffee drink pizza moan lack kettle suggested website overall 4 5 extra cleanliness

Reviews.Title: “Don't book it!!”
Reviews.Author: Susbox
Reviews.Content: hotel 30 minute bus trip termini rail station residential front desk unhelpful rude believe offer shuttle service city centre reported website dont breakfast pretty poor hardly selection offer wasnt worth eating cranky service lady

Reviews.Title: “Very helpful staff, Quiet location.”
Reviews.Author: theexplorer25
Reviews.Content: husband stayed honeymoon little centre liked hotel staff accomodating esp mario yuri thoroughly enjoyed pina colada rooftop terrace patio easy centre 90 bus round corner takes termini 20 mins 60 takes colesseum 30 mins couple nice restaurants walking distance loved mexican restaurant margharitas hotel travellers dont mind mixing locals infact cultural experience loved

Reviews.Title: “OK HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: IrelandDuchess
Reviews.Content: husband stayed ars hotel feburary 2010 size furniture totally outdated pictures help nice quiet resturants nearby 90 bus brings enjoyed trip rome

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel, quiet location”
Reviews.Author: rebeccajones1976
Reviews.Content: enjoyed stay ars hotel despite slightly comical name yes 30 minutes bus ride centre rome price reflected enjoyed peace quiet night stayed city centre simple clean decor hotel modern light airy reception staff helpful downside stay service night possibly worse food local fast food outlet cold rubbery time definately recommend staying hotel
